aspectran.description: | | {{bold}}--- Aspectran Demo Application ---{{bold:off}} | |{{underline}}Built-in commands for this console application:{{underline:off}} | {{green}}desc on{{fg:off}} - Prints a description of the command each time the command is executed | {{green}}desc off{{fg:off}} - Turns off print a description of the command each time the command is executed | {{green}}help{{fg:off}} - Prints help for the available commands that was displayed at startup | {{green}}restart{{fg:off}} - Restarts this console application | {{green}}mem{{fg:off}} - Shows memory usage | {{green}}gc{{fg:off}} - Performs a garbage collection | {{green}}quit{{fg:off}} - Exits from this console application | |{{underline}}Commands that can run examples:{{underline:off}} | {{green}}hello{{fg:off}} - Runs the helloWorld() method of the sampleAction bean and prints the returned value. | {{green}}hello2{{fg:off}} - Runs the helloWorld() method of the sampleAction bean and prints the returned value with margins. | |{{underline}}To control Jetty, try one of the following commands:{{underline:off}} | {{green}}jetty{{fg:off}} - Displays commands required to control Jetty Server | {{green}}jetty start{{fg:off}} - Runs a Jetty Server | {{green}}jetty stop{{fg:off}} - Stops the currently running Jetty Server | |{{underline}}Running! Point your browsers to:{{underline:off}} | {{green}}http://localhost:8080/{{fg:off}} |
